sl.sli: BytesParser: This Operator parse a a input String that represents raw data (ASCII,Hexadecimal,Binary) and produce a map<rstring,rstring>.
public rstring ASCIIToBinaryString(rstring): Function that transform an ASCII string into it correspondant Binary string example : "IBM" -> "010010010100001001001101"
public rstring ASCIIToHexString(rstring): Function that transform an ASCII string into it correspondant Hexadecimal string example : "IBM" -> "49424D"
public rstring HexStringToBinaryString(rstring): Function that transform an Hexadecimal string into it correspondant Binary string example : "49424D" -> "010010010100001001001101"
